data.name: Super Animal Royale Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Super Animal Royale: Official Game Soundtrack

by Jake Butineau

Delivered to your ears as 320 kbps MP3's and lossless FLAC files.

Vol 1 Tracklist:
1. Super Animal Theme
2. De Fault
3. Welcome to Super Animal World!
4. Where We Dropping?
5. Pete's Song
6. Default Dance (Extended)
7. Floss Dance (Extended)
8. Juggling Dance (Extended)
9. Russian Dance (Extended)
10. Super Animal Theme (Piano)

[Updated September 26, 2019] We've completed Volume 2 of the Official Soundtrack and we're adding all its tracks to the Steam Soundtrack DLC without any change to the price! Just grab the update and now you'll get an additional 12 tracks. Thanks so much your support, Super Animals.

Vol 2 Tracklist:
1. Blue Jay Z
2. Kelly Larkson
3. Lady Caw Caw
4. Super Animal Royale Tonight!
5. Super Animal Farm
6. Super Summer Royale
7. Praise Banan!
8. Tap Dance (Extended)
9. Peanut Butter Jelly Dance (Extended)
10. Laugh Dance (Extended)
11. Super Animal Theme (Demo Versions)
12. PandUp Comedy

[Updated December 17, 2021] Volume 3 has been added to the Soundtrack DLC with 34 new tracks (again with no increase to the price, and you get them all if you already own it)! Enjoy, Super Animals. :)

Vol 3 Tracklist:
1. Super Animal Super Show
2. Rebel March
3. Royale With Cheese
4. Crustacean Oscillation
5. Ella Fishgerald
6. Super Howloween
7. Super CRISPRmas
8. The Bwoking Dead
9. Escape From The Cluckles
10. Super Shooting Gallery
11. Carl's Cart
12. Macawsome!
13. Super Museum of Modern Art
14. Ferret of the Opera
15. The Lab Lab
16. The Inventor
17. Dam Good Music
18. Countdown!
19. Hee-haunting Howl-aween
20. Super Animal Royale Tonight...line
21. How The Finch Stole CRISPRmas
22. Storming the Rebels
23. You Can Never Have Too Mini
24. Quittin' Time
25. Busy Busy Beavers
26. SARturday Night Fever Dance
27. Stretch Dance
28. Surrender Emote
29. Country Dance
30. Rap Dance
31. Super Animal Super Show (Instrumental)
32. Busy Busy Beavers (Instrumental)
33. Mini Mart - We Ship!
34. Imagine If All Super Animals Could Live In Petes
